name: Fly Adventure
about: Fly Adventure flying school is dedicated to providing exceptional flight training experiences in the stunning environments of Idaho and the Reno/Lake Tahoe area. Our mission is to serve those seeking true stick and rudder skills, specializing in tailwheel and backcountry training. With over 35 years of flying experience, our instructors offer one-on-one, comprehensive training tailored to each student's pace and desires. We operate from the Reno-Stead Airport and the Cascade, ID Airport, providing access to legendary backcountry airstrips. Our training includes earning tailwheel endorsements, pilots certificates, and advanced certificates, all conducted in well-maintained aircraft. We ensure a fun and rewarding journey, making your aviation dreams a reality with our expert-led and supportive training environment. Join us for an unforgettable flying experience.
